name: BLOODY TEARS (MEDWARDS ART)
description:
BLOODY TEARS -

Homage to the Retro days of games and inspired by cult classics that came before it... Bloody tears is a Metroidvania NES style action platformer that tells the story of Countess Marya Zaleska,  the daughter of Count Dracula and herself a vampire.  Following Dracula's death, the angel of hope Michelle awakens Marya from her long slumber for she believes that by destroying  Dracula's Curse Marya will be free of his demonic grasp and be able live in peace normally among the living.But this will be no easy task for Marya must face the evil forces of death journey across forsaken lands of darkness brave labyrinths temples graveyards and much more to reach her final goal Dracula's castle.  Will she stop the hordes of evil sent upon man by her father and put to rest the Curse of Dracula once and for all!!!

(this is one of my first games and was made to help me practice in the game engine.I made Bloody Tears in my free time and it means the world to me that you will play it I hope to someday make bigger and better games!!!!-mike)
